# Data citations of all datasets used in manuscript, including ones generated by this manuscript.

[dataset] Nolen, Z.J., Yildirim, B., Irisarri, I., Liu, S., Groot Crego, C., Amby, D.B., Mayer, F., Gilbert, M.T.P., and Pereira, R.J.; 2020; Historical isolation facilitates species radiation by sexual selection: Insights from Chorthippus grasshoppers; GitHub; 10.5281/zenodo.4238318

[dataset] Nolen, Z.J., Yildirim, B., Irisarri, I., Liu, S., Groot Crego, C., Amby, D.B., Mayer, F., Gilbert, M.T.P., and Pereira, R.J.; 2020; Historical isolation facilitates species radiation by sexual selection: Insights from Chorthippus grasshoppers; NCBI SRA; PRJNA665162

[dataset] Nolen, Z.J., Yildirim, B., Irisarri, I., Liu, S., Groot Crego, C., Amby, D.B., Mayer, F., Gilbert, M.T.P., and Pereira, R.J.; 2020; Historical isolation facilitates species radiation by sexual selection: Insights from Chorthippus grasshoppers; Dryad; 10.5061/dryad.pzgmsbchj

[dataset] Liu, Y. and Huang, Y.; 2008; Chorthippus chinensis mitochondrion, complete genome; NCBI GenBank; NC_011095.1

[dataset] Vanderbilt University; 2015; Chorthippus parallelus parallelus raw sequence reads; NCBI SRA; PRJNA280771

[dataset] Berdan, E.L., Mazzoni, C.J., Waurick, I., Roehr, J.T., Mayer, F.; 2015; Three species of Chorthippus grasshoppers. C. biguttulus, C. brunneus, and C. mollis raw sequence reads; NCBI SRA; PRJNA284873

[dataset] Shi, H. and Huang, Y.; 2009; Phlaeoba albonema mitochondrion, complete genome; NCBI GenBank; NC_011827.1

[dataset] Gao, J. and Huang, Y.; 2010; Gomphocerus licenti mitochondrion, complete genome; NCBI GenBank; NC_013847.1

[dataset] Huang, Y. and Liu, N.; 2010; Arcyptera coreana mitochondrion, complete genome; NCBI GenBank; NC_013805.1

[dataset] Sun, H., Zheng, Z., and Huang, Y.; 2010; Gomphocerippus rufus mitochondrion, complete genome; NCBI GenBank; NC_014349.1

[dataset] Zhao, L., Zheng, Z.M., Huang, Y. and Sun, H.M.; 2010; Euchorthippus fusigeniculatus mitochondrion, complete genome; NCBI GenBank; NC_014449.1

[dataset] Jiang, G.F., Ma, J.D. and Han, M.; 2012; Ceracris kiangsu isolate H6012 mitochondrion, complete genome; NCBI GenBank; NC_019994.1

[dataset] Zhang, H.L., Zhao, L., Zheng, Z.M. and Huang, Y.; 2013; Gomphocerus sibiricus mitochondrion, complete genome; NCBI GenBank; NC_021103.1

[dataset] Song, W., Zhi, Y., Liu, G., Yin, H. and Zhang, D.; 2014; Orinhippus tibetanus mitochondrion, complete genome; NCBI GenBank; NC_023467.1

[dataset] Xiao, L.L., Zhou, Z.J. and Huang, Y.; 2008; Locusta migratoria migratoria mitochondrion, complete genome; NCBI GenBank; NC_011119.1

[dataset] Xiao, L.L., Zhou, Z.J. and Huang, Y.; 2008; Locusta migratoria migratoria mitochondrion, complete genome; NCBI GenBank; NC_011114.1

[dataset] Ma, C., Liu, C., Yang, P. and Kang, L.; 2008; Oedaleus decorus asiaticus mitochondrion, complete genome; NCBI GenBank; NC_011115.1
